snippet.title: Chow Chow Kootu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
Ingredients:
1 chayote chow-chow
1/2 cup Moong dal
3 cup Water
5-6 small onion or 1/2 regular Onion
2 Garlic cloves
2 green Chillies
Salt as required 

For Grinding:
1/2 cup Coconut
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1 small onion
1 garlic clove
1/4 tsp Turmeric

For Tempering:
1 tbsp Oil
1 small Onion
2 red chillies
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
Curry leaves

snippet.title: Roadside Masala Fried Rice Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Fried Rice recipe in Tamil. Fried rice is a quick, easy, and flavorful dish that’s perfect for lunchboxes, dinners, or even as a party favorite! Made with cooked rice stir-fried in a hot wok with colorful vegetables, aromatic garlic, soy sauce, and simple seasonings, this dish is full of flavor and comes together in just minutes. It’s a great way to use up leftover rice and transform it into a delicious one-pot meal.

This street-style fried rice recipe is a favorite among kids and adults alike, especially when paired with manchurian or chilli chicken. Whether you’re new to cooking or looking for a fast meal idea, this fried rice recipe is incredibly simple and satisfying. The vibrant mix of crunchy vegetables, soft rice, and bold seasoning makes it irresistible. You can also customize it by adding eggs or paneer for a protein boost.

In this Tamil cooking video, we’ll walk through each step to help you get that perfect fried rice flavor at home – just like you’d enjoy from your favorite restaurant or street vendor!

Friends, please do try this fried rice recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
250g Chicken without bones
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/4 tsp garam masala
1/4 tsp Pepper powder
1 tsp lemon juice
salt as required
1 tbsp Corn flour
1/2 Egg

2-3 Eggs
1/4 tsp pepper
Salt as required 

For masala fried Rice:
2 tbsp Oil
1 tsp Ginger
1 tsp Garlic
1/2 Onion
1/2 Bell Pepper
1 Carrot
1 cup Cabbage
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chicken masala or 1/2 tsp Garam masala
Salt as required
1/2 tsp Pepper
1 tbsp Oil
1 cup Basmati Rice /200g (3 cup Cooked Rice)
Coriander leaves

snippet.title: Healthy Sprouts Laddu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Healthy Sprouts Ladoo recipe in Tamil. This sprouts laddu is a unique and nutritious sweet that combines the goodness of protein-rich sprouts with the traditional taste of Indian ladoos. It’s a wholesome treat, perfect for kids, fitness enthusiasts, or anyone looking for a guilt-free dessert option. Made with sprouted green gram and naturally sweetened ingredients, this ladoo is both delicious and power-packed with nutrients.

Sprouts are an excellent source of protein, fiber, and essential vitamins, making this sweet an ideal energy booster. Unlike regular sweets, this ladoo supports digestion, immunity, and overall health while satisfying your sweet cravings. Whether you're preparing snacks for school boxes or looking for a post-meal dessert that doesn't compromise on health, this sprouts laddu is the perfect choice.

In this Tamil cooking video, we’ll learn how to make this easy and healthy sweet with just a few ingredients and no refined sugar. The taste is earthy and slightly nutty, complemented by mild sweetness and traditional Indian flavors.

sproutsladoorecipe, healthyladoorecipeintamil, proteinladduintamil, kidshealthysnackintamil, sweetswithoutsugarintamil, sproutsrecipesintamil, ladduintamil

Friends, please do try this healthy sprouts ladoo recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 9-10 medium sized ladoo
1/2 cup green gram
10-12 cashews
10-12 Almonds
1/4 cup Peanuts
3 Cardamom
2 tbsp ghee
1/4 cup Raisins
2 -3 tbsp sugar or Jaggery (optional)

snippet.title: Beignets recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Beignets recipe in Tamil. These golden, fluffy beignets are the perfect treat for anyone who loves soft, pillowy pastries dusted with powdered sugar. Originally a classic French pastry and famously popular in New Orleans, this recipe brings a delicious international twist to your kitchen – all explained in Tamil for your convenience!

Made with a simple yeasted dough and deep-fried to perfection, these beignets are light, airy, and irresistible. Whether you’re serving them as a tea-time snack, a weekend breakfast indulgence, or a party dessert, they are sure to be a hit with kids and adults alike. The crispy outside combined with the soft, warm inside and the snowy dusting of sugar makes every bite feel special and comforting.

In this Tamil recipe video, we’ll show you how to prepare the perfect dough, achieve the ideal puff while frying, and get that classic look and taste that makes beignets so addictive. Even if you’re new to making fried dough recipes, this step-by-step tutorial will guide you with ease.

beignetsrecipeintamil, frenchpastryintamil, teatimerecipeintamil, sweetrecipeintamil, doughnutalternativetamil, easydessertintamil, homemadebeignetsintamil, deepfriedpastryintamil

Friends, please do try this beignets recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Luke Warm Milk (125 ml)
1 tsp Sugar
1 tsp Yeast (3 g)
1 small Egg
1/2 tsp Salt
1/4 cup Sugar (50 g)
1 tsp Vanilla extract
2 tbsp melted Butter
2+1/4 cup Maida (280g)
Oil for frying
powdered Sugar for coating

snippet.title: Potato Rava keerai Roti Breakfast recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Potato Rava Keerai Roti recipe in Tamil. This nutritious and delicious breakfast recipe combines the wholesomeness of potatoes, the goodness of green keerai (spinach), and the unique texture of rava (semolina) to create a soft, flavorful roti that is perfect for a healthy start to the day. Packed with fiber, iron, and energy-boosting ingredients, this roti is a great alternative to regular breakfast items and is ideal for both kids and adults.

The combination of mashed potatoes and finely chopped greens gives the roti a soft and chewy texture, while the rava adds a subtle crispness that makes every bite enjoyable. It doesn’t require any side dish, as the blend of spices in the dough itself gives it enough flavor. This is a perfect lunchbox recipe as well—easy to prepare, filling, and mess-free.

In this Tamil cooking video, we’ll walk you through the step-by-step process of making this tasty and healthy Potato Rava Keerai Roti using simple ingredients available in your kitchen. Whether you're looking for a quick breakfast or a wholesome evening snack, this recipe will surely become a favorite.

potatorotiintamil, keerairotiintamil, ravarotiintamil, breakfastrecipeintamil, healthybreakfastintamil, tiffinrecipeintamil, rotiwithoutmaida, easyrotirecipeintamil

Friends, please do try this Potato Rava Keerai Roti recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 6 :
1 large Potato (200g)
1 cup Water
1/2 tsp Cumin powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2-3/4 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 cup Rava
Salt as required
1/2 Onion
handful Coriander leaves
1 cup Spinach (optional)
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Roadside Mushroom Vadai recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Roadside Mushroom Vadai recipe in Tamil. This crispy and spicy mushroom vadai is a delicious twist on the classic street-style masala vadai, perfect for tea-time or as an evening snack. Loaded with the earthy flavor of mushrooms and infused with traditional South Indian spices, this vadai is crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside—just like the ones you find at roadside tea shops and stalls!

Mushroom vadai is a great way to enjoy the nutritional benefits of mushrooms in a familiar and much-loved format. The taste is enhanced by finely chopped onions, green chilies, and aromatic herbs, making every bite irresistible. It’s a perfect snack during the monsoon or winter season, and pairs beautifully with coconut chutney or a hot cup of tea.

In this Tamil cooking video, we’ll see how to make this flavorful roadside-style mushroom vadai easily at home, using simple ingredients. If you're a fan of street food or looking to try something different from the usual snacks, this recipe is a must-try!

mushroomvadairecipe, roadsidevadaiinTamil, mushroomrecipesintamil, eveningteasnackintamil, southindianvadairecipe, crispyvadairecipeintamil, tamilnadufood

Friends, please do try this roadside mushroom vadai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/4 cup Chickpea flour
1/4 cup Rice flour
1/4 cup Corn flour
1 large Onion
Curry leaves
Coriander leaves
2-3 Green Chilli
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Pepper powder
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 cup Sweet Corn (boiled)
1/2 cup chopped Mushroom (10 mushroom)
Salt as required
Water as required

snippet.title: Cauliflower Fingers Recipe in Tamil | Cauliflower Sticks Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Cauliflower Fingers recipe in Tamil. These crispy cauliflower fingers are a perfect snack for your evening tea or as a party appetizer! Made with fresh cauliflower florets coated in a flavorful batter and deep-fried to golden perfection, this recipe gives you the perfect crunch in every bite. The outer layer is crisp and spicy, while the inside is tender and packed with flavor. This is a great way to enjoy cauliflower in a fun and kid-friendly form. Whether you're serving them to guests or preparing them as a quick homemade snack, these cauliflower fingers are sure to be a hit with everyone. They’re also easy to customize with your favorite spices and serve with chutney, sauce, or even as a crunchy side to your main meal.
#cauliflowerrecipe #appetizer #cauliflowersnacks 

Friends, please do try this cauliflower fingers recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
Makes 20 cauliflower Fingers:
250g Cauliflower
1 large potato (200g)
1 small piece Ginger
2 Green Chillies
handful Coriander leaves
2 tbsp Onion
1 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
3-4 tbsp Rava
3-4 tbsp Maida
required Salt

For the outer coating:
1/2 cup Maida
Water
Salt
pepper
Bread crumbs

snippet.title: Kaima Idli recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Kaima Idli recipe in Tamil. Kaima Idli is a delicious and spicy restaurant-style dish made by transforming leftover idlis into a flavorful snack or meal. This recipe is a popular choice at many South Indian eateries, especially in Tamil Nadu, where deep-fried idlis are tossed in a spicy masala loaded with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.

This dish is perfect for using up your leftover idlis in the most exciting way possible! The crispy idli pieces soak up the masala beautifully, offering a burst of flavor in every bite. It’s spicy, tangy, and slightly crunchy – a real treat for your taste buds. Whether you serve it as an evening snack or a light dinner, Kaima Idli is sure to impress both kids and adults alike.

In this Tamil recipe video, I will show you step-by-step how to make the perfect Kaima Idli at home – just like you’d get at your favorite restaurant! With simple ingredients and a quick cooking process, this is an ideal recipe for busy days when you want something tasty without spending too much time in the kitchen.

kaimaidlirecipeintamil, restaurantstyleidliintamil, leftoveridlirecipe, spicyidlirecipeintamil, southindiansnackintamil, easytiffinrecipeintamil, masalaidliintamil, tamilrecipes

Friends, please do try this Kaima Idli recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!





Ingredients:
5-6 leftover Idlis
2-3 tbsp Oil for frying
2-3 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
1 tsp fennel seeds
1 large Onion
1 tsp Ginger
2 Green Chillies
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Turmeric 
1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Chicken masala or Garam masala
2 Tomatoes
1 tbsp Tomato sauce
1/4 cup Peas
1/4 cup Capsicum
Coriander leaves for garnishing

snippet.title: French crepe recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make French Crepe recipe in Tamil. French crepes are soft, thin pancakes that are incredibly versatile and absolutely delicious! Whether served sweet or savory, crepes are a wonderful treat that’s perfect for breakfast, brunch, or dessert. In this recipe, we’ll be making the classic sweet version with a soft and light texture, ideal for filling with fruits, chocolate, or cream.

Crepes may look fancy, but they are surprisingly simple to make with basic ingredients you likely already have at home. The batter is smooth and easy to pour, and once cooked on a hot pan, each crepe comes out thin, delicate, and perfect. These French-style crepes are sure to impress your family and are especially loved by kids for their melt-in-the-mouth feel.

In this Tamil cooking video, we will guide you step-by-step on how to make perfect crepes right in your own kitchen. You can customize them with your favorite fillings — Nutella, banana, honey, jam, or even just a dusting of powdered sugar. It’s a must-try recipe if you’re looking for a quick and elegant dish that’s sure to delight!

frenchcrepeintamil, creperecipeintamil, breakfastrecipeintamil, easytamilrecipe, sweetrecipeintamil, pancakerecipeintamil, crepesweetintamil

Friends, please do try this French crepe recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: 
Makes 13-14 Crepes
3 large Eggs
1 cup Milk (250 ml)
1/2 cup Water
1/4 cup melted Butter (50g)
1/4 cup Sugar (50g)
1/2-1 tsp vanilla extract
pinch of Salt
1 cup Maida (125 g)

For the Custard Cream:
1 tsp Custard powder or Corn flour
1 cup Milk
3 tbsp Sugar
1/4 tsp Vanilla extract

snippet.title: Thattapayaru Kulambu Recipe | Karamami Kara Kulambu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Karamani Kara Kulambu recipe in Tamil. This spicy and flavorful South Indian-style kulambu is made using karamani (black-eyed peas), which adds a unique taste and hearty texture to the dish. Perfectly balanced with tanginess from tamarind and a rich blend of traditional spices, this kulambu is the ultimate comfort food that goes wonderfully with hot steamed rice and a spoonful of ghee. Karamani Kara Kulambu is a great everyday kuzhambu that is both nutritious and filling. Black-eyed peas are rich in protein and fiber, making this a wholesome vegetarian option for lunch or dinner. The freshly ground masala, when slow-cooked with tamarind and karamani, gives a bold and aromatic flavor that’s simply irresistible. It's especially comforting on rainy days or when you’re craving a spicy and homely meal.
#karamanikarakulambu #kulambuvarietiesintamil #kulamburecipe 

Friends, please do try this karamani kara kulambu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Black eyed peas (Thattapayaru / Karamani)
1-1.25 cup Water
Salt

For the Masala Base:
2 tbsp Oil
1 tsp Cumin seeds
1/2 tsp Pepper corns
4 Garlic
5 small Onion
1 Tomato
1/8 tsp Turmeric
1.5 tbsp Coriander powder
1.5 tsp Chilli powder
1/4 cup grated Coconut

For the Thatta payaru Kulambu:
4 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
10-12 Fenugreek
1 dried Red Chilli
1/4 tsp Asafoetida
7-8 Garlic cloves
10 Small Onion
Curry leaves
2 Brinjal
1 Potato
1 Lemon sized Tamarind soaked in Water
Water as required
Salt as required

snippet.title: Ammini Kozhukattai Recipe in Tamil | Kara Ammini Kozhukattai Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Ammani Kozhukattai recipe in Tamil. Ammani Kozhukattai is a traditional South Indian snack that’s soft, flavorful, and incredibly satisfying. These bite-sized dumplings are made with rice flour and lightly spiced, then tossed in a tempering of mustard seeds, curry leaves, and grated coconut to bring out their delicate taste. Often prepared during Ganesh Chaturthi or as an evening tiffin, this dish is a beloved part of Tamil cuisine. This Ammani Kozhukattai is the perfect blend of texture and flavor — soft on the inside and slightly crispy outside when sautéed. It’s healthy, light, and ideal for both kids and adults. Whether you’re looking for a festive offering or a wholesome snack, this recipe will not disappoint. It’s a great way to use leftover kozhukattai dough and transform it into a new, delicious dish.
#ammankozhukattai #kozhukattairecipeintamil 


Friends, please do try this Ammani Kozhukattai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 cup Idiyappam/Kozhuttai flour
1 tsp Oil
1/2 tsp Salt or as required
boiling Water

For making Podi:
2 tbsp Channa dal
1 tbsp Urad dal
2-4 dried Red Chillies
1/4 cup Coconut + extra if required
Salt as required

For Tempering:
2 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Black gram
2 red Chillies
Curry leaves
1/2 Onion

snippet.title: Chana Dal Namkeen Recipe in Tamil | Kadalai Paruppu Fry Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Channa Dal Fry Namkeen recipe in Tamil. This crunchy and spicy snack is a perfect tea-time treat that’s both tasty and satisfying. Made by deep-frying soaked channa dal (kadalai paruppu) and tossing it with flavorful Indian spices, this namkeen is a popular homemade snack enjoyed by all age groups. It has the perfect combination of crispiness, spice, and saltiness, making it hard to stop with just one bite! Channa dal fry is a classic Indian savory snack, often found in mixtures or served plain with a hot cup of tea or coffee. It's not only easy to prepare but also a healthier alternative to many store-bought snacks, as you can control the oil and spice levels. This snack stays fresh for several days when stored in an airtight container, making it a great option for festivals, travel, or just regular snacking.
#namkeen #homemadesnack #chanadalfry 

Friends, please do try this channa dal fry namkeen recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 cup Channa Dal / Kadalai Paruppu / Yellowsplit Pea
1/2 tsp Baking Soda
1/2 tsp Salt
Oil for Frying

For Seasoning:
Curry leaves
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Chat masala
1/2 tsp Salt or as required

snippet.title: Punugulu Recipe in Tamil | Crispy Evening Snack with leftover Dosa Batter
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Punugulu recipe in Tamil. Punugulu is a popular South Indian evening snack that’s crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, perfect to enjoy with a cup of hot tea or coffee! Made using leftover idli or dosa batter, this quick and tasty snack is a great way to turn your everyday ingredients into something truly delightful. These golden, crunchy fritters are flavored with simple spices and herbs, making every bite burst with flavor. Punugulu is a favorite street food in Andhra and Tamil Nadu, and now you can recreate that same taste right in your home kitchen. Whether you're hosting guests or just craving something crispy and spicy, this recipe is your go-to choice. Serve it hot with coconut chutney or spicy tomato chutney.
#punugulurecipe #punugulu #punuguludosabatter

Friends, please do try this punugulu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 cup Dosa Batter
1/2 cup Maida
1/4 cup Onion
1/4 cup Coriander leaves
1 green Chilli
1 tsp Cumin seeds
1/8 tsp Baking Soda
Salt as required 
Water if needed to correct the batter consistency
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Bakery Style Tea Cake Recipe in Tamil | Sponge Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Bakery style Tea Cake recipe in Tamil. This soft, fluffy, and buttery tea cake is a classic bakery favorite that pairs perfectly with your evening tea or coffee. Baked to golden perfection, this cake has a tender crumb and rich flavor, just like the ones you get in your favorite local bakery. Whether you're making it for a cozy snack at home or to impress guests, this tea cake recipe is simple, foolproof, and absolutely delicious. The best part about this bakery-style tea cake is its versatility—it can be enjoyed plain or topped with nuts, fruits, or even a dusting of powdered sugar. The mild sweetness and soft texture make it a great option for kids and adults alike. If you’ve been craving that nostalgic taste of bakery tea cakes from your childhood, this recipe is sure to bring back sweet memories.
#teacake #cakerecipeintamil #spongecake 

Friends, please do try this tea cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Butter (100)
1 cup Sugar (200g)
2 large Eggs
1.5 cup Maida (185g)
1.5 tsp Baking powder
1/4 tsp Salt
1/4 cup Curd
1/4 cup Milk
1.5 tsp Vanilla extract
Bake at 350F/175C for 26-27 min  (7 inch pan)

snippet.title: Tomato Pulao Recipe in Tamil | Lunchbox Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Tomato Pulao recipe in Tamil. This flavorful and aromatic Tomato Pulao is a quick and delicious one-pot meal that’s perfect for lunch boxes, family dinners, or even festive occasions. Made with ripe, juicy tomatoes, fragrant spices, and basmati rice, this pulao brings together the perfect balance of tanginess and warmth in every bite. The soft grains of rice infused with tomato masala make it a comforting and satisfying dish for all ages. Tomato Pulao is not only easy to prepare, but also very versatile. You can serve it with simple curd, raita, or even a spicy gravy for a wholesome and fulfilling meal. It’s a wonderful choice for busy weekdays when you want to prepare something tasty yet uncomplicated. This South Indian style pulao carries the traditional flavors and is sure to be a hit with your family.
#tomatopulao #tomatopulav #varietyricerecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this Tomato Pulao recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients 
3 large Tomatoes (350g)
few mint and coriander leaves

2 tbsp Oil
2 tbsp Ghee
2 Bay leaves
2 Cinnamon
3 Cloves
3 Cardamom
2 star anise
10 pepper
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds
1 Onion
2 green Chillies
2 tsp Ginger
handful Mint and Coriander leaves
10 Cashews
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chilli powder
required Salt (little greater than 1.5 tsp)
1 cup Water
1/2 cup Coconut Milk
1 cup Basamati Rice (200g)

snippet.title: Cham Cham Recipe in Tamil | Bengali Milk Sweet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Cham Cham recipe in Tamil. Cham Cham, also known as Chomchom, is a traditional Bengali sweet that is soft, juicy, and absolutely delightful! Made from fresh chenna (paneer), this sweet is soaked in sugar syrup and stuffed or garnished with a touch of khoya or coconut, making it rich, flavorful, and perfect for festive occasions. The soft, spongy texture combined with the light sweetness makes Cham Cham a favorite for all sweet lovers. Cham Cham is one of the most loved Indian sweets and is commonly prepared during festivals like Diwali, Durga Puja, and special family gatherings. Its vibrant appearance and melt-in-the-mouth texture make it stand out among traditional milk sweets. It is similar to Rasgulla but with an added twist of creamy stuffing and a richer finish.
#chamcham #sweetrecipesintamil #festivalsweetrecipe 

Friends, please do try this Cham Cham recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients
2 cup Milk (500ml)
1 tbsp Vinegar
1/2 cup Water
1/5 cup Sugar
1.5 cup Water
4-5 Cardamom

snippet.title: Mango Panna Cotta Recipe in Tamil | Dessert Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Mango Panna Cotta recipe in Tamil. In this recipe we are going to make our own cream layer from scratch instead of store bought cream. This Mango Panna Cotta is a smooth, rich and creamy dessert with the tropical sweetness of ripe mangoes, making it a perfect summer treat! With its elegant layers and velvety texture, this dessert not only looks beautiful but also melts in your mouth with every bite. The fresh mango puree adds a fruity burst of flavor that balances perfectly with the soft and delicate cream base. This Italian-inspired dessert is simple to make and requires just a few ingredients, yet delivers a luxurious experience. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or just want to impress your family with something special, Mango Panna Cotta is a wonderful choice. Mango Panna Cotta is also great for festivals and celebrations, offering a refreshing twist to traditional sweets. The combination of mango and cream is truly irresistible, and the silky finish makes it a favorite among both kids and adults alike.
#mangopannacotta #pannacottarecipe #pannacotta 

Friends, please do try this Mango Panna Cotta recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
For the Mango Layer
1 tsp gelatin (or Agar agar) (3 g)
2 tbsp Water
3 large Mangoes (1.5 cup pulp)
1/4 cup Sugar 
2-3 tbsp Water

For the Cream layer:
3 cup Milk (reduce to 1 cup) (or 1/2 cup Milk + 1/2 cup Cream)
1 tsp gelatin (or Agar agar) (3 g)
2 tbsp Water
1/4 cup Sugar 
2-3 tbsp Water
1/4 tsp Vanilla extract or Cardamom powder

In this video we will see how to make Karamani Kuchi recipe in Tamil. This snack recipe is a much-loved snack in Tamil households, especially during festivals and special occasions. Made with black-eyed beans (karamani), this dish has a unique texture and natural sweetness that’s both healthy and satisfying. The soft, chewy interior and crispy outer layer make it a delightful treat for all age groups.
Karamani Kuchi is not only delicious but also packed with protein and nutrients, making it a great choice for guilt-free snacking. The flavor of karamani is mild, and when deep-fried to perfection, the result is a crisp golden treat that’s hard to resist. Whether you’re celebrating a special day or just craving something traditional and homemade, this Karamani Kuchi recipe is a perfect tea time snack for evenings.

Friends, please do try this Karamani Kuchi recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1/2 cup Karamani (black-eyed peas)
1-1.25 cup Water
1 tbsp Oil
1 Onion
1 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Cumin powder
1/4 cup chickpea flour
2 medium potatoes
Coriander leaves
Salt as required
bread crumbs for coating
1-2 tbsp Maida if required
Oil for pan frying

snippet.title: Chicken Lasagna Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Chicken Lasagna recipe in Tamil. This delicious and cheesy Chicken Lasagna is the ultimate comfort food, layered with juicy chicken, flavorful tomato sauce, creamy béchamel, and gooey melted cheese. Every bite is rich and satisfying, making it the perfect dish for family dinners, special occasions, or weekend indulgence!

Homemade lasagna might sound complicated, but with this simple and clear Tamil recipe, you’ll find it easy and enjoyable to prepare. The layers of pasta sheets soaked in flavorful sauces and seasoned chicken come together to create a mouthwatering dish that’s sure to impress your loved ones. Whether you’re a fan of Italian cuisine or just want to try something new, this recipe is a must-try for food lovers.

This Chicken Lasagna recipe can be made ahead and baked just before serving, making it ideal for gatherings or parties. Serve it with garlic bread or a fresh salad for a complete meal that everyone will love. The cheesy top and the perfectly baked layers inside make this dish a real showstopper!

Friends, please do try this Chicken Lasagna recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For the Pasta sauce:
1 kg red Tomatoes
1 tbsp Oil
2 tsp grated Garlic
1-2 tsp Sugar
1 tsp Salt
2 tsp Italian seasoning
or 2.5 cup readymade pasta sauce

For the Cream filling:
4 cup Milk
4 tbsp Lemon juice
1/4 tsp Salt
1/4 tsp Pepper
1/4 cup cream
1 Egg

For the Chicken :
450g Chicken without bones
1 tbsp Oil
1 tsp Garlic
1 Onion
1.5 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Cumin powder
1/4 tsp pepper
required Salt

2 cup Mozzarella Cheese (250g)
6 lasagna sheet
coriander leaves

snippet.title: Masala Bread Toast Recipe in Tamil | Bread Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Masala Bread Toast recipe in Tamil. This spicy and flavorful bread toast is the perfect option for a quick breakfast, evening snack, or even a light dinner. Loaded with sautéed vegetables and simple spices, this toast is crispy on the outside and packed with delicious masala flavor on the inside. This Masala Bread Toast is a street-style favorite that can be made easily at home with pantry staples. It’s a fantastic way to transform plain bread into a satisfying dish that’s sure to please both kids and adults. The combination of soft veggies, a hint of spice, and buttery toasted bread makes it irresistible every single time. Whether you're running late for work or just want a quick and easy meal, this recipe will come in handy. You can customize the masala to your taste and even add cheese for an extra treat. Serve it hot with ketchup or chutney and enjoy the comforting flavors of this quick and easy toast.
#masalabread #breadtoastrecipe #breadrecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this Masala Bread Toast recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 6 paneer masala bread toast
1/4 cup Chickpea flour
1/4 cup Rice flour
1/2 Onion
Curry leaves
Coriander leaves
1/2 tsp Ginger paste
1 Green Chilli
1/4 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2-3/4 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Sesame seeds
1/2 cup grated Paneer
Salt as required
Water as required
Oil (3-4 tsp / slice)

snippet.title: Paasiparuppu Payasam Recipe in Tamil | இனிய தமிழ் புத்தாண்டு நல்வாழ்த்துக்கள்
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Paasiparuppu Payasam recipe in Tamil. This traditional South Indian dessert is a festive favorite, especially during Tamil New Year, Pongal, and other special occasions. Made with moong dal (paasiparuppu), jaggery, and creamy coconut milk, this payasam is rich, delicious, and full of authentic flavor. The subtle nuttiness of roasted moong dal paired with the natural sweetness of jaggery gives this payasam a comforting taste that’s both nostalgic and satisfying. The texture is smooth and creamy, and it’s delicately flavored with cardamom and garnished with ghee-roasted cashews and raisins. It’s the perfect way to end a festive meal or to treat yourself to something wholesome and sweet. Whether you're celebrating a festival or just in the mood for a cozy homemade dessert, this Paasiparuppu Payasam is sure to bring joy to your table. It’s simple to make, requires minimal ingredients, and tastes absolutely divine!
#pasiparuppupayasam #payasam #payasamintamil 

Friends, please do try this Paasiparuppu Payasam recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Moong Dal (100g)
1.5 cup Water
1.5 cup grated Coocnut
1/2+3/4+3/4 cup Water
1 cup+2 tbsp Jaggery 
3/4 cup Water
1-2 tbsp Ghee
2 tbsp Coconut chunks
10 Cashews
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Pineapple Halwa Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Pineapple Halwa recipe in Tamil. This pineapple halwa is a delicious South Indian-style sweet that perfectly balances the natural tanginess of fresh pineapple with the rich, sweet flavors of ghee and sugar. Made from scratch using simple ingredients, this halwa is soft, glossy, and bursting with tropical flavor.The juicy pineapple pieces add a refreshing twist to the traditional halwa recipe, making it a unique treat that’s ideal for festive occasions, special gatherings, or as a quick dessert to satisfy your sweet cravings. The rich aroma of cooked pineapple combined with the texture of halwa gives this dish an irresistible appeal, making it a hit among both kids and adults.

Whether you’re a fan of fruit-based desserts or looking for a new sweet dish to try, this pineapple halwa is sure to impress. The vibrant color and melt-in-the-mouth texture make it a festive favorite, and it's incredibly easy to prepare at home with minimal effort.
#pineapplehalwa #halwarecipeintamil #pineapplerecipe 

Friends, please do try this pineapple halwa recipe at home and enjoy it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to share your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1/2 cup Rava
1 cup Water
1 cup pineapple puree
1 cup Water
1.25 cup Sugar
8-10 tbsp ghee
cashews

snippet.title: Homemade Rice Noodles Recipe in Tamil | Noodles from Rice Flour | Restaurant Style Noodles at Home
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Homemade Rice Noodles with Chili Oil Recipe in Tamil. This dish is a perfect combination of soft, silky rice noodles coated in a flavorful, spicy chili oil that adds the right amount of heat and aroma. Made from scratch, these fresh rice noodles are light, chewy, and pair beautifully with the rich, fragrant homemade chili oil. If you love spicy noodles and enjoy trying new, simple, and delicious homemade recipes, this rice noodles with chili oil is a must-try! Whether you’re looking for a quick meal, a comforting dish, or an easy recipe to impress your family, this homemade rice noodles recipe will surely be a favorite. The best part? It’s gluten-free, easy to customize, and packed with bold flavors that make every bite absolutely irresistible.
#homemadenoodles #ricenoodles #noodlesrecipeintamil 

Friends, do try this Rice Noodles with Chili Oil recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, don’t forget to leave your feedback in the comments below. Enjoy this spicy, flavorful delight and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
To make Rice Noodles:
1 cup Rice flour
1/2 cup Tapioca starch
1/2 tsp Salt
2 tsp Oil
Water ( little more than 1.5 cup)
Oil for greasing the plate

For making Chilli Oil:
1 tbsp Chilli flakes
1 tbsp Kashmiri chilli flakes
1 tsp kashmiri chilli powder
1 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1 tsp Sugar
1 tsp Salt
1 tsp Sesame seeds
1 tbsp Soy sauce
2 tsp Vinegar
2-3 tsp chopped Garlic
1 tsp ginger paste
1/4 cup Hot Oil

For making sauce Noodles:
2 tbsp Oil
2 tsp chopped garlic
1 tsp chopped Ginger
1/2 Onion
Carrot, Capsicum, Cabbage
2 tsp Chilli sauce
2 tsp Tomato sauce
2 tsp Soy sauce
1/4 tsp pepper powder
Salt as required
spring Onion

snippet.title: Potato masala Stuffed Capsicum Bajji Recipe in Tamil | குடைமிளகாய் பஜ்ஜி
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Potato Masala Stuffed Capsicum Bhaji, a crispy and flavorful snack that is perfect for any occasion! This stuffed capsicum bajji features a delicious filling made with spiced potato masala, coated in a crispy, golden gram flour batter, and deep-fried to perfection. The combination of soft and flavorful potato filling with the crunchy exterior makes this dish absolutely irresistible. Whether you’re looking for an evening snack, a tea-time treat, or a special dish for a festive gathering, this stuffed bell pepper bhaji is a must-try! This capsicum bhaji is a unique twist on the classic aloo bajji and adds a delicious crunch with every bite. The flavorful potato stuffing is well-balanced with aromatic spices, making it an ideal street-style snack. It pairs perfectly with chutney or a hot cup of tea, making it a favorite during monsoons and winter evenings. You can also prepare this easy potato stuffed bajji for parties or special occasions, or during family gatherings.
#capsicumbhaji #stuffedcapsicumrecipe #potatostuffedbhaji

Friends, do try this Potato Masala Stuffed Capsicum Bhaji at home and enjoy it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to share your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 large Capsicum
2 tbsp Oil
mustard seeds
1/2 tsp cumin seeds
1/2 Onion
1 tsp ginger
2 green chillies
curry leaves
1/2 tsp chilly powder
2 large Potatoes
salt as required
handful coriander leaves

For bhaji batter:
1 cup chickpea flour
1/4 cup Rice flour
1.5-2 tsp chilli powder
1/2 tsp Asafoetida
pinch of baking soda
Salt as required
Water as required

snippet.title: Dum Adai Recipe in Tamil | Eid Sweet Recipe in Tamil |
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Dum Adai, a delicious and traditional Eid sweet that is rich, flavorful, and perfect for celebrating special occasions! This authentic Dum Adai recipe is a festive delight, made with simple ingredients yet packed with irresistible taste and aroma. Soft, mildly sweet, and infused with the richness of ghee, this Eid special sweet is a must-try for those who love traditional homemade desserts. Whether you are preparing for Ramadan, Eid celebrations, or simply craving a comforting sweet treat, this Dum Adai is sure to impress! It is easy to make and is loved by both kids and adults alike. Serve it warm for a delightful experience, or enjoy it as a perfect festive dessert after a hearty meal.
#dumadai #eidrecipe #eidspecialrecipe 

Friends, do try this Eid special Dum Adai recipe at home and share it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to leave your feedback in the comments below. Wishing you all a blessed Eid and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1.5 cup Rava (250g approx)
1.5 cup thick Coconut Milk
2 cup Sugar (400g)
soak for 10 hrs

2 Eggs
3/4 cup Ghee (150g)
1/2 cup Maida (65g)
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
1/8 tsp Salt
1/2 cup Milk
20 Cashews soaked
1/4 cup Milk for grinding cashews

Divide the batter in 2 and bake at 180 C/ 350 F for 30-32 min 7 inch pan
small bowls takes approximately 15 min for baking

snippet.title: Paasipayaru Sweet Recipe in Tamil | Susiyam Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Paasipayaru Susiyam, a delicious and traditional South Indian sweet snack! This green gram susiyam recipe is a festive favorite, featuring a flavorful filling made with paasipayaru (moong dal) and jaggery, encased in a crispy, golden outer layer. With its perfect balance of sweetness and texture, this dish is a must-try for anyone who loves authentic Tamil sweets. Whether you're preparing it for special occasions, festive celebrations, or simply craving a homemade treat, this easy susiyam recipe is sure to impress!
#susiyam #pasiparuppusweet #susiyamrecipe 

Paasipayaru Susiyam is not only tasty but also nutritious, as green gram (moong dal) is packed with protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. The combination of jaggery and lentils gives it a rich, caramelized sweetness while keeping it naturally healthy. This traditional South Indian sweet is commonly prepared during festivals like Diwali and Navaratri, making it a nostalgic dish for many households. The crispy outer layer perfectly complements the soft and sweet filling, making every bite irresistible!

Friends, do try this Paasipayaru Susiyam recipe at home and share it with your family and friends. Let us know your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!



Ingredients:
Makes 10 Paasipayaru susiyam

1/2 cup Green Gram (100g)
1 cup Water
pinch of Salt
1/2 cup Coconut
3/4 cup Jaggery (125g)
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
1-2 tsp Ghee

For the Outer layer:
1/2 cup Wheat flour or Maida
2 tbsp Rice flour
1/8 tsp Baking powder
1/8 tsp Salt
Water as required to make a semi thick batter
tags: how to make susiyam in tamil

snippet.title: Creamy Mango Sago Dessert Recipe in Tamil | Summer Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Creamy Mango Sago Dessert, a refreshing and delicious treat perfect for summer! This mango sago pudding is made with juicy, ripe mangoes, chewy sago pearls, and a rich, velvety coconut or milk-based sauce, creating a luscious dessert that melts in your mouth. snippet.title: Beetroot Pasta Recipe in Tamil | Homemade Pink Pasta Sauce Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Beetroot Pasta, a vibrant and healthy twist on classic pasta! This creamy beetroot pasta recipe is packed with nutrients and flavor, featuring the natural sweetness of beets blended into a rich and silky sauce. The stunning pink color makes this dish visually appealing, while the earthy, slightly sweet taste pairs perfectly with pasta for a delicious meal. Whether you're looking for a quick pasta recipe, a fun way to add more veggies to your diet, or a unique dish to impress your guests, this homemade beetroot pasta is a must-try!

This easy beetroot pasta is not just flavorful but also incredibly nutritious. Beets are rich in antioxidants, fiber, and essential vitamins, making this recipe a great choice for a wholesome meal. The creamy sauce coats the pasta beautifully, creating a dish that's both comforting and satisfying. You can serve it as a weeknight dinner, a special weekend meal, or even a quick lunch idea that’s both tasty and healthy.

Friends, do try this beetroot pasta recipe at home and share it with your family and friends. Let us know your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For making Cottage cheese:
2 cup Milk
2-3 tbsp Lemon juice

For the Beetroot Sauce:
1 medium Beet (100g)
Water
1 Tomato
prepared cottage cheese from above
1/2 cup Milk

For the Beetrrot pasta:
2 tbsp Butter
2 tsp Garlic
4 tbsp Onion
1/2 tsp pepper powder
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
200g pasta (2 cup)
salt as required
1/4-1/2 cup cheese (optional)
1/2 tsp Italian seasoning (optional)

snippet.title: Kavuni Arisi Kanji Recipe in Tamil | கருப்பு கவுனி அரிசி கஞ்சி | Black Rice Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Kavuni Arisi Kanji, a healthy and nutritious porridge made with black rice. This traditional Tamil Nadu recipe is packed with antioxidants, fiber, and essential nutrients, making it a great option for a wholesome breakfast or a light meal. Black rice kanji has a rich, slightly nutty flavor and a beautiful deep purple color that makes it as delightful to look at as it is to eat! Kavuni Arisi, also known as black glutinous rice, has been used for centuries in South Indian cuisine for its health benefits. This easy kanji recipe is naturally gluten-free and is perfect for those looking for a comforting yet nourishing dish. Kavuni Arisi can be enjoyed plain or with a touch of jaggery or coconut, this healthy porridge is both satisfying and delicious.

Friends, do try this Kavuni Arisi Kanji recipe at home and enjoy its numerous health benefits. Share it with your friends and family, and let us know your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1/2 cup Karuppu Kavuni arisi (100g)
3 cup Water
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
Salt as required
3/4 cup Curd or as required
Water as required

For Tempering:
2 tsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
1 inch Ginger
2 Green chillies
Curry leaves
4-5 small onion

chopped Onion and coriander leaves for garnishing
tags: karuppu kavuni arisi recipes in tamil

snippet.title: Kaju Katli Kulfi Recipe in Tamil | Fancy Kulfi Recipe | Summer Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Kaju Katli Kulfi Recipe at home in Tamil. This traditional Indian frozen dessert is the ultimate summer treat, perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings on a hot day! Made with creamy milk, fragrant saffron, and crunchy nuts, this homemade kulfi is rich, flavorful, and incredibly refreshing. Unlike regular ice cream, kulfi has a denser, creamier texture that melts slowly, allowing you to enjoy each bite even more. Whether you’re hosting a party, celebrating a festival, or simply looking for a delicious Indian dessert, this easy kulfi recipe is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. Kulfi holds a special place in Indian cuisine, loved by both kids and adults alike. With its aromatic flavors and smooth texture, it’s the perfect ending to any meal. You can make this kulfi with just a few simple ingredients, and it requires no fancy equipment.
#kulfi #kulfirecipe #kajukatlikulfi

Friends, please do try this kulfi recipe at home and enjoy the nostalgic taste of this beloved Indian street food dessert. Don’t forget to share it with your friends and family, and let us know your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
100g Cashews (3/4 cup)
3/4 cup Milk
1/2-3/4 cup Sugar
2 cup Milk
Cardamom powder

3 tbsp Pistachios
3 tbsp Milk
4 tbsp Sugar
1/2 cup Milk

snippet.title: Making the Best Oats Recipe with Fresh Fruits & Nuts | Oats Recipe in Tamil | Oats Breakfast Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Oatmeal recipe in a simple and delicious way. This healthy oatmeal breakfast is perfect for starting your day with a nutritious and filling meal. Made with wholesome oats, creamy milk, and naturally sweet ingredients, this comforting dish is both satisfying and packed with health benefits. Whether you like your oatmeal sweet or savory, this easy recipe can be customized to suit your taste. Oatmeal is one of the best healthy breakfast recipes, known for its high fiber content, which helps keep you full for longer. It’s also great for heart health and digestion, making it a wonderful choice for anyone looking for a nutritious meal. This quick oatmeal recipe can be prepared in minutes, making it ideal for busy mornings. You can top it with fruits, nuts, seeds, or even a drizzle of honey for extra flavor.
#oatsrecipe #oatsrecipeintamil #oatsforbreakfast 
Whether you are trying to eat healthier, want to enjoy a comforting bowl of oats, or are looking for a kid-friendly breakfast, this oatmeal recipe is a perfect option. Friends, please do try this easy oatmeal recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, do let us know your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

1 Banana
1 cup water
1 cup milk
1 cup instant oats
2-4 tbsp honey or sugar
Nuts

Ingredients for Apple Oatmeal recipe:

2 stick Cinnamon
1 cup water
1 cup milk
1 cup instant oats
2-4  sugar
Nuts

snippet.title: Semiya Kheer recipe in Tamil | Vermicelli Kheer Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make a delicious Semiya Kheer recipe, a classic Indian dessert that’s creamy, rich, and perfect for any special occasion. Made with vermicelli, milk, and aromatic spices, this Semiya Payasam is a delightful treat that melts in your mouth and leaves you wanting more. Whether you're celebrating a festival, hosting a family dinner, or simply indulging your sweet tooth, this dessert is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. The smooth, velvety texture combined with the subtle sweetness and the crunch of nuts makes Semiya Kheer an all-time favorite for kids and adults alike. It’s quick to prepare and can be customized with your favorite ingredients like saffron, raisins, or cardamom to enhance its flavor. Serve it warm or chilled, and enjoy the irresistible taste of this traditional Indian delicacy.
#semiyakheer #semiyapayasam #vermicellikheer 

Friends, do try this Semiya Kheer recipe at home and share it with your loved ones. Let us know your feedback and thoughts in the comments below. Wishing you all the best in your cooking journey. Enjoy this mouthwatering dessert and make your celebrations even sweeter!

1 cup Milk
10 Almonds
10 Cashews
2 tbsp Ghee

2 tbsp Almonds
2 tbsp Raisins

3/4 cup Sugar (150g)
1/2 tsp Cardamom powder
Extra milk if needed to adjust the consistency

snippet.title: kashmiri Pulao recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will learn how to make a flavorful and aromatic Kashmiri Pulao, a fragrant rice dish from the beautiful region of Kashmir. Kashmiri Pulao is known for its unique blend of spices, dry fruits, and vibrant colors, making it a perfect addition to any festive meal or special occasion. With its subtle sweetness and a hint of saffron, this dish offers a delightful combination of savory and sweet flavors that are truly irresistible. Whether you're hosting a dinner party, preparing a special meal for your loved ones, or just craving a comforting rice dish, Kashmiri Pulao is a fantastic choice. The beautiful combination of basmati rice, aromatic spices, and the rich addition of fruits and nuts like cashews, almonds, and raisins makes this pulao not only visually appealing but also a treat for your taste buds. Kashmiri Pulao is perfect to serve alongside  curries, or as a standalone dish for a lunch/dinner.

#KashmiriPulao #PulaoRecipe#  #easypulaorecipe  

Don't forget to try this pulao recipe at home and share it with your friends and family and also please do share your feedback in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
4 tbsp Ghee
2 Bay leaves
3 cardamom
3 cloves
3 small piece cinnamon
1 back cardamom
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
1/4 cup Cashews
1/4 cup Almonds
1/4 cup Raisins
1/2 cup Pineaaple
1/2 cup Apple
1/4-1/2 tsp Sugar
1 cup Basmati rice
Saffron
1/2 cup Milk
1.5 cup Water
Salt as required
fried onion
pomegranate for garnishing

snippet.title: Chilli Prawn Manchurian Recipe in Tamil | Indo Chinese Prawns Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Chilli Prawn Manchurian, a spicy and flavorful Indo-Chinese dish that’s perfect for seafood lovers. This mouthwatering recipe combines crispy prawns with a tangy, spicy sauce, creating a delightful burst of flavors in every bite. Whether you’re planning a dinner party, looking for an exciting appetizer, or craving a restaurant-style dish at home, this Prawn Manchurian recipe is sure to impress. The combination of tender prawns, bold spices, and crunchy vegetables makes this dish an all-time favorite. It’s a great addition to any meal, and its versatility allows you to pair it with fried rice, noodles, or enjoy it as a standalone snack. The balance of heat, sweetness, and savory notes makes Chilli Prawn Manchurian a crowd-pleaser for all age groups.
#chilliprawns #prawnsmanchurian #manchurianrecipe 

Friends, do try this Chilli Prawn Manchurian recipe at home and delight your family with this restaurant-style treat. Don’t forget to share your feedback in the comments section below. Happy cooking and enjoy this delicious seafood creation!

1/4 tsp Soy sauce

For Manchurian style chilli prawns
2 tbsp Oil
1 tsp chopped Ginger
1 tbsp chopped Garlic
2 red Chillies
1 Onion
Bell Pepper

salt as required

spring Onion

snippet.title: Protein Packed Breakfast Handvo Recipe in Tamil | Gujarati Savory Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make a delicious Handvo recipe, a traditional Gujarati savory cake that’s wholesome, flavorful, and packed with nutrients. Handvo is a perfect blend of lentils, rice, and vegetables, spiced to perfection and cooked to a golden-brown crust. This dish is a great option for breakfast, a snack, or even a light meal, offering a satisfying taste and texture that everyone will love.
Whether you’re looking for a quick and healthy snack idea, a party appetizer, or a new dish to include in your meal rotation, this Gujarati Handvo recipe is a fantastic choice. The crisp outer layer combined with the soft and spongy interior makes it a delightful dish that can be served with chutney or yogurt for an extra burst of flavor.
#handvo #handvorecipe 

Friends, do try this Handvo recipe at home and enjoy the authentic taste of Gujarat with your loved ones. Let us know your thoughts and feedback in the comments below. Happy cooking and enjoy this healthy, delicious dish!

Ingredients:
Makes 2 piece:
1/2 cup Rice
1/4 cup Channa dal
1/4 cup Thoor dal
2 tbsp Urad dal
1/4 cup Curd
1/4 tsp Sugar
Water as required
Ferment for 6-8 hrs

2 tbsp Oil
Mustard seeds
2 Green chillies
1 tsp Ginger
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Asafoetida
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1.5 cup Veggies of your choice
2 tbsp Peanuts
1/4 tsp baking Soda (optional)
Water if required
Coriander leaves
Salt to taste

For making Hondvo
2 tbsp Oil
Mustard seeds
Sesame seeds
Curry leaves
1/2 of Hondvo Batter

snippet.title: French Madeleine Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Madeleine recipe in Tamil. Madeleines are classic French butter cakes with a soft, spongy texture and a distinctive shell-like shape. These bite-sized treats are a perfect combination of lightness and richness, making them an all-time favorite for tea-time snacks or elegant desserts. This homemade Madeleine recipe delivers delicate, golden-brown cakes with a hint of buttery goodness and a subtle citrus aroma. Whether you're planning to impress guests at a dinner party or simply want to treat yourself to something special, these Madeleines are a guaranteed hit. Their iconic hump and tender crumb make them a timeless delight for all occasions.
#madeleine #bakingrecipes 

Friends, do try this Madeleine recipe at home and enjoy the authentic French bakery experience right in your kitchen. Share this delightful treat with your friends and family, and let us know your feedback in the comments below. Happy baking and bon appétit!


Ingredients:
Makes 16 Madeleines
1/2-1 tsp Lemon Zest
2 Eggs
1/2 cup Sugar (100g)
1/8 tsp Salt
1 tsp baking powder
1 tsp Vanilla extract
3/4 cup Maida (100g)
1/2 cup Butter (100g)
Bake at 200C/390F for 8-9 min

snippet.title: Pori Arisi Urundai recipe in Tamil Arisi ladoo recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Pori Arisi Urundai recipe in Tamil. Pori Arisi Urundai, also known as puffed rice balls, is a classic South Indian sweet made with puffed rice and jaggery. This delightful treat is a staple during festive occasions like Karthigai Deepam and is loved for its light, crispy texture and natural sweetness. Making homemade Pori Urundai is a simple yet satisfying process. The jaggery syrup binds the puffed rice together into perfectly shaped balls that are both delicious and nutritious. This traditional snack is not only a festival favorite but also a healthy option for kids and adults alike, perfect for anytime munching or as a sweet indulgence after meals.
#PoriarisiUrundai #arisiladoo #sweetrecipeintamil 

Friends, do try this Pori Arisi Urundai recipe at home and enjoy it with your family. Don't forget to share your feedback in the comments below. Happy cooking and enjoy this festive delight!


Ingredients:
Makes 12 medium sized ladoos:
1/2 cup Rice (100g)
2-3 Cardamom
3/4 cup jaggery(100g)
1 cup Water
2 tbsp Ghee
10 Cashews
1/4 cup Coconut
2 tbsp Ghee  (optional)

snippet.title: Falooda Recipe in Tamil | Falooda Plate Recipe | Homemade Falooda in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Falooda recipe in Tamil. Falooda is a refreshing and indulgent dessert drink that’s perfect for cooling down on a hot day or as a delightful treat after a hearty meal. In this recipe we are going to make a deconstructed Falooda and layer the ingredients on a plate. Layered with silky vermicelli, sweet basil seeds, colorful jelly, and creamy milk, this dessert is a feast for both the eyes and the taste buds. Topped with a scoop of your favorite ice cream and drizzled with rose syrup, Falooda is a crowd-pleaser that everyone will love. Whether you're hosting a party, planning a family gathering, or simply craving a sweet treat, this homemade Falooda recipe is easy to make and irresistibly delicious. Its vibrant layers and rich flavors make it a favorite for kids and adults alike. Try this classic dessert to add a special touch to any occasion!
#faloodarecipe #homemadefalooda #faloodakulfi 

Friends, please do try this Falooda recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
For making Jelly:
2 tsp gelatin or Agar agar powder (6g)
1 cup Water
1/4 cup Sugar
few drops of rose essence

For Falooda sev:
1/2 cup Corn flour
1.5 cup Water
2 tbsp Sugar
pinch of yellow color

For Sugar syrup:
1/2 cup Sugar
1/2 cup Water
few drops of rose essence

extras:
1 tbsp Sabja seeds soaked in Water
Ice cream
Nuts for garnishing

Whether you're hosting a party, planning a family gathering, or simply craving a sweet treat, this homemade Falooda recipe is easy to make and irresistibly delicious. Its vibrant layers and rich flavors make it a favorite for kids and adults alike. Try this classic dessert to add a special touch to any occasion!
#faloodarecipe #homemadefalooda #faloodakulfi 

Friends, please do try this Falooda recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
For making Jelly:
2 tsp gelatin or Agar agar powder (6g)
1 cup Water
1/4 cup Sugar
few drops of rose essence

For Falooda sev:
1/2 cup Corn flour
1.5 cup Water
2 tbsp Sugar
pinch of yellow color

For Sugar syrup:
1/2 cup Sugar
1/2 cup Water
few drops of rose essence

extras:
1 tbsp Sabja seeds soaked in Water
Ice cream
Nuts for garnishing

snippet.title: Eggless Kinnathappam Recipe in Tamil | Fluffy Steamed Rice Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Kinnathappam recipe in Tamil. This traditional South Indian dessert is a silky, steamed delicacy made with simple ingredients yet packed with rich, authentic flavors. Known for its smooth texture and mild sweetness, Kinnathappam is a timeless treat that holds a special place in many households. Whether you’re preparing for a festival, a family gathering, or simply craving a nostalgic dessert, this homemade Kinnathappam recipe is the perfect choice. Its soft, melt-in-your-mouth consistency and delightful flavor make it an all-time favorite for both kids and adults. This easy-to-make dessert is a great way to bring the essence of tradition to your kitchen.
#kinnathappam #egglesskinnathappam #steamedricecake 

Friends, please do try this Kinnathappam recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1/2 cup Raw Rice (100g)
2 tbsp Rava
1 cup grated Coconut + 1.5 cup Water
3 cardamom
3/4-1 cup Jaggery (120-150g)
chopped nuts
